scotty.database.parser

Class DbParserUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • scotty.database.parser.DbParserUtilities

  • public final class DbParserUtilities
extends Object
    Utility methods used by the database portions of Scotty.

    • Method Summary

      Print out the contents of a database, flattening all the inheritance to the instance level.

      Print out the contents of a database, flattening all the inheritance to the instance level and showing the similarity score with the context passed in.

    • Method Detail

      • query

        public static List<Context> query(Context context,
                  Context criteria)
        Query a context for all the contexts within it that match a criteria.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to query.
        criteria - The criteria to match.
        Returns:
        the list of matches in ranked order

      • rankedQuery

        public static List<Ranked<Context>> rankedQuery(Context context,
                                Context criteria)
        Query a context for all the contexts within it that match a criteria.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to query
        criteria - the criteria to match
        Returns:
        the results, with their associated ranks in ranked order

      • print

        public static void print(Database database,
         PrintStream printStream)
        Print out the contents of a database, flattening all the inheritance to the instance level.
        Parameters:
        database - the database
        printStream - the output stream

      • print

        public static void print(Database database,
         PrintStream printStream,
         Context context)
        Print out the contents of a database, flattening all the inheritance to the instance level and showing the similarity score with the context passed in. Zero similarity matches are discarded.
        Parameters:
        database - the database
        printStream - the output stream
        context - the Context to compare instances to.
